item.title: CVE-2024-24740|2024-09-28T22:22:42.214Z -- sap_se -- sap%20netweaver%20application%20server%20abap%20%28sap%20kernel%29
item.description: SAP NetWeaver Application Server (ABAP) - versions KERNEL 7.53, KERNEL 7.54, KERNEL 7.77, KERNEL 7.85, KERNEL 7.89, KERNEL 7.93, KERNEL 7.94, KRNL64UC 7.53, under certain conditions,Â allows an attacker to access information which could otherwise be restricted with low impact on confidentiality of the application.
